name: Eric Cartman
description: A manipulative, foul-mouthed student at South Park Elementary.

name: Stan Marsh
description: The moral center of the group, often trying to do the right thing.

name: Kenny McCormick
description: Often dies in most episodes only to return the next time.

name: Kyle Broflovski
description: The intellectual, strong-willed, and often the most rational of the boys.
